h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Scorpionlord
content: You'll also need to be ready to deal with a variety of claw swipes he can employ: Some come in two slow slashes as he staggers about, while another comes in a series of quick downward slams before he pauses for one final slam that can throw off your timing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Scorpionlord'.
The content is as follows:
You'll also need to be ready to deal with a variety of claw swipes he can employ: Some come in two slow slashes as he staggers about, while another comes in a series of quick downward slams before he pauses for one final slam that can throw off your timing.
